column2: I will be your 'budi' throughout this game
Press the right arrow key to move to the right
and press the left arrow key to move to the left
Press on the space bar to jump
Now you know how to move along the screen!
You just encounter an info icon
Hit the icon to see interesting info
Collect as many evidence as you can
This will help you on the upcoming game
The number on the top left will show you the remaining number of evidence
You are required to collect a minimum of 2 evidence before you can move to the next stage
You are now ready to start playing!
